name: Llama and Tisa
description:
Do you love Lamas much as we do?

 In this game you can play as a cute llama!

Jump, collect, explore, help the villagers and just enjoy the game.

Controllers are supported.

Platform : PC 

Engine : Unity 

Number of players : 1

Credits:
